criteria.name: Non-text Content
criteria.description: All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose.

checks.name: Image alt text
checks.description: Images must have alt text describing their content or purpose

checks.name: Decorative images
checks.description: Decorative images should have empty alt or role='presentation'

criteria.name: Info and Relationships
criteria.description: Information, structure, and relationships conveyed through presentation can be programmatically determined.

checks.name: Heading hierarchy
checks.description: Headings must follow a logical hierarchy (H1 > H2 > H3, no skipped levels)

checks.name: H1 presence
checks.description: Each page should have exactly one H1 heading

checks.name: Form input labels
checks.description: Form inputs must have associated labels (label element or aria-label)

criteria.name: Contrast (Minimum)
criteria.description: The visual presentation of text has a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1.

checks.name: Text contrast
checks.description: Text must have sufficient contrast ratio against background
checks.note: Requires computed style analysis - deferred to runtime

criteria.name: Keyboard
criteria.description: All functionality of the content is operable through a keyboard interface.

checks.name: Keyboard focusable
checks.description: All interactive elements must be keyboard focusable

checks.name: Keyboard accessible buttons
checks.description: Buttons should have text or aria-label for keyboard users
checks.failCondition: button without text AND without ariaLabel

criteria.name: Bypass Blocks
criteria.description: A mechanism is available to bypass blocks of content that are repeated on multiple pages.

checks.name: Skip navigation link
checks.description: Pages should have skip-to-content link for keyboard users

criteria.name: Link Purpose (In Context)
criteria.description: The purpose of each link can be determined from the link text alone or together with its programmatically determined link context.

checks.name: Descriptive link text
checks.description: Link text should describe the destination, not generic phrases

criteria.name: Headings and Labels
criteria.description: Headings and labels describe topic or purpose.

checks.name: Descriptive headings
checks.description: Headings should describe the content that follows

criteria.name: Target Size (Minimum)
criteria.description: The size of the target for pointer inputs is at least 24 by 24 CSS pixels.

checks.name: Minimum target size
checks.description: Interactive elements must be at least 24x24 CSS pixels

criteria.name: Language of Page
criteria.description: The default human language of each page can be programmatically determined.

checks.name: Page language
checks.description: HTML element should have lang attribute

criteria.name: Error Identification
criteria.description: If an input error is automatically detected, the item that is in error is identified and the error is described to the user in text.

checks.name: Error identification
checks.description: Form errors should clearly identify which field has the error

criteria.name: Labels or Instructions
criteria.description: Labels or instructions are provided when content requires user input.

checks.name: Visible input labels
checks.description: Form inputs should have visible labels (not just placeholders)

criteria.name: Name, Role, Value
criteria.description: For all user interface components, the name and role can be programmatically determined.

checks.name: Landmark regions
checks.description: Page should have appropriate landmark regions (main, navigation, etc.)

checks.name: Button accessible name
checks.description: All buttons must have an accessible name (text or aria-label)
